I. Introduction
===============

Being pregnant with a third child can bring about a mix of emotions and physical changes that may differ from previous pregnancies. While some women may feel more confident and experienced in managing their pregnancy, others may face new challenges and concerns. Recognizing the signs of pregnancy and seeking medical attention and support are crucial to ensuring a healthy pregnancy and delivery.
